title: Azunia Tequila Dinner

banner_image.name: Padre_AzuniaTequilaDinner_937x400
banner_image.alt: Artwork of agave and text that reads Azunia Tequila Dinner July 11th

description:
Cool down with Azunia Tequila on our rooftop bar on July 11th with five chef inspired courses perfectly paired with fresh, fun Azunia tequilas in various forms - cocktails, tasters, and more. Learn about how tequila is made, where it comes from, and how to differentiate between the many styles.

VIEW MENU >

$75 per person, 21+ over only

ABOUT AZUNIA TEQUILA
Azuñia is handcrafted 100% pure Weber Blue Agave tequila that is the exclusive U.S. export of Agaveros Unidos de Amatitán and its second-generation, family-owned-and-operated Rancho Miravalle estate. Organic Azuñia agave is grown in dedicated fields of the Jalisco valley, harvested by hand and roasted in traditional clay hornos to ensure authenticity and depth of flavor. We then finish with a natural, open-air fermentation process and bottle on-site in small batches using a consistent process to deliver field-to-bottle quality.

Learn about how tequila is made, where it comes from, and how to differentiate between the many styles.
